title: Vampire: The Masquerade® - Bloodlines™ 2 - Santa Monica Memories
description: Santa Monica Memories is a cosmetic pack with iconic items, with a Stop Sign, Voerman Portrait, and Ankaran Sarcophagus, to decorate your haven. Each time you complete the game as a new clan, your haven will also be adorned with a clan neon sign.
